abstract.text: The Adyen SDK version.

call does not work for your needs,

API call.

and

The Drop-in handles the presentation of available payment methods and the subsequent entry of a customer’s payment details. It is initialized with the payment methods of the
response, and handles the entire checkout flow under the hood for most of use cases.
Adyen Components for iOS are available through either CocoaPods, Carthage or Swift Package Manager.
